description.displayText: Debbie has been caring for our girls for this past school year, providing safe transportation on a daily basis. She is always punctual, communicates effectively and super reliable. We would not have made it through the year without her! Our typically shy/anxious girls absolutely love her and have built a positive relationship with her.
description.originalText: Debbie has been caring for our girls for this past school year, providing safe transportation on a daily basis. She is always punctual, communicates effectively and super reliable. We would not have made it through the year without her! Our typically shy/anxious girls absolutely love her and have built a positive relationship with her.

description.displayText:
Debbie assisted our family with childcare duties when our child was remote for school. She was extremely helpful with the transition to remote schooling. She kept our child on-task and assisted when there were questions about the school work. She was an integral part of our child's success this past fall. 

Debbie was always on-time for work and she was flexible when we needed her to stay beyond the regular work hours. She is a kind, thoughtful and considerate person. We would definitely contact her again in the future if needed. We recommend Debbie without reservation.

description.displayText: Debbie worked for us for a couple of years and was a great sitter for our two children. She is warm, friendly, dependable and reliable.  Both of my children liked her a lot.  We would highly recommend her!
